about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our mission and values

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Pompousweek, we're revolutionising the way people create custom 3D models. Our mission is to make professional-grade 3D design accessible to everyone through the power of artificial intelligence.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2024, Pompousweek emerged from a simple observation: creating custom car parts and home decorations shouldn't require years of 3D modelling expertise. We combined cutting-edge AI technology with user-friendly interfaces to democratise 3D design. Today, we're proud to serve thousands of creators, makers, and enthusiasts worldwide.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: How Can We Help You?
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our 3D model generator

q1.question: How does the AI 3D model generator work?
q1.answer: Our AI analyses your text description and generates a detailed 3D model based on your specifications. Simply describe what you want to create, select the category, and our advanced AI will handle the rest.

q2.question: What file formats do you support?
q2.answer: We provide models in both STL and BLEND formats. STL files are perfect for 3D printing, whilst BLEND files can be further edited in Blender.

q3.question: Can I edit the generated models?
q3.answer: Yes! BLEND files can be opened and modified in Blender, a free 3D modelling software. STL files can be edited using various 3D editing tools.

q4.question: How long does generation take?
q4.answer: Most models are generated within 2-5 minutes, depending on complexity. You'll receive a notification once your model is ready to download.

q5.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
q5.answer: You can regenerate models with different descriptions at no extra cost. We're committed to helping you achieve the perfect result.

q6.question: Do you offer commercial licences?
q6.answer: Yes! All generated models come with a commercial licence, allowing you to use them for personal or commercial projects.
